PIC32CX-BZ Zigbee API Reference
Data Fields
_BcZCLActionReq_t Struct Reference

#include <sysEvents.h>

Data Fields

BcZCLAction_t action
const void * context
uintptr_t denied

Detailed Description

Type of data which is passed as the data parameter into an event handler of the BC_ZCL_EVENT_ACTION_REQUEST event. An initiator must initialize all fields of the structure before calling of the SYS_PostEvent() function.

Definition at line 397 of file sysEvents.h.

Field Documentation

BcZCLAction_t _BcZCLActionReq_t::action

An action for which permissions/validation are requested.

Definition at line 400 of file sysEvents.h.

const void* _BcZCLActionReq_t::context

The pointer to a parameter's structure which are associated with the action.

Definition at line 402 of file sysEvents.h.

uintptr_t _BcZCLActionReq_t::denied

The result of action request. The value 0 means the action is permitted, any other values mean access denied. The initiator must write a default value.

Definition at line 405 of file sysEvents.h.
